description: Tahini and dark chocolate make these light oat cookies feel indulgent.
name: Chocolate Chip Tahini Oat Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 1012 minutes until golden but still gooey. Remove from the oven and allow to cool for 5 minutes on the baking trays before serving.
